Run Differential Expression Analysis on BulkRNAseq Object

Source: R/analysis_methods.R
runDiffAnalysis.Rd

Perform differential expression analysis on BulkRNAseq object using DESeq2, edgeR, or limma-voom

Usage

runDiffAnalysis(
  object,
  method = c("DESeq2", "edgeR", "limma_voom"),
  group_col = "group",
  treat_level = "treat",
  control_level = "con",
  fc_cutoff = 1,
  padj_cutoff = 0.05,
  min_counts = 1,
  normalize_method = "quantile",
  result_name = NULL
)

Arguments

object

A BulkRNAseq object

method

Character, analysis method: "DESeq2", "edgeR", or "limma_voom"

group_col

Character, column name in metadata for grouping, default "group"

treat_level

Character, treatment level name, default "treat"

control_level

Character, control level name, default "con"

fc_cutoff

Numeric, log2 fold change threshold, default 1

padj_cutoff

Numeric, adjusted p-value threshold, default 0.05

min_counts

Numeric, minimum count threshold (DESeq2 only), default 1

normalize_method

Character, normalization method (limma-voom only), default "quantile"

result_name

Character, name for storing results in object, default NULL (auto-generated)

Value

Updated BulkRNAseq object with analysis results added

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Create example object
counts_mat <- matrix(rpois(1000, 10), nrow = 100, ncol = 10)
rownames(counts_mat) <- paste0("Gene", 1:100)
colnames(counts_mat) <- paste0("Sample", 1:10)

metadata <- data.frame(
  group = rep(c("con", "treat"), each = 5),
  row.names = colnames(counts_mat)
)

bulk_obj <- BulkRNAseq(counts_mat, metadata)

# Run different analyses
bulk_obj <- runDiffAnalysis(bulk_obj, method = "DESeq2")
bulk_obj <- runDiffAnalysis(bulk_obj, method = "edgeR")
bulk_obj <- runDiffAnalysis(bulk_obj, method = "limma_voom")
} # }
